title: Active Learning - Extract patterns from learnings to refine contexts
description: Extend zikaron beyond passive retrieval to active learning. Analyze indexed learnings/conversations to extract patterns, then propose context refinements. This creates a feedback loop where successful patterns from past sessions improve future Claude behavior.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Design pattern extraction approach - what patterns to look for in learnings (recurring fixes, common mistakes, successful techniques)
Create `zikaron analyze` command that scans indexed content for patterns
Pattern output as structured JSON with confidence scores
Create `zikaron suggest-context` command that proposes context file updates based on patterns
Human review step - suggestions written to `docs.local/context-proposals/` for manual approval
Add story context to learnings during indexing (story ID, criteria, outcome)
Document the active learning workflow in README or docs
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)

notes: This is exploratory/architectural. May need to split into smaller stories after initial investigation. Key insight: learnings tied to story outcomes provide training signal for what worked.
